mapper.select: select * from booklist WHERE TRUNC(checkin) = TRUNC(sysdate) OR TRUNC(checkout) = TRUNC(sysdate)
select name , tel , email , username, black , vip from users where name LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
select bookNo from book where booktel = #{tel} and bookStatus='체크인대기'
select bookNo , totalCount from book where bookTel = #{tel}
select username , name , tel , email , personalId , disabled , userLevel ,bookCnt,black,vip from users where name = #{name}

SELECT DISTINCT b.booker, b.booktel, b.totalCount , rb.roomno, b.bookdate, rb.bookroomgrade, rb.checkin, rb.checkout, rb.breakfast, d.resno, b.bookstatus FROM book b LEFT JOIN dinner d ON d.resno = b.bookno LEFT JOIN roombooking rb ON rb.bookno = b.bookno
